title: Average retail price for ground beef in Canada 2015 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in CAD for both 2016 and 2015 have grew.
For Month Oct, 2015 had the highest Average retail price in CAD 1323.0 among the 5 groups and in Dec, 2019 had the lowest Average retail price in CAD 0.0.
Month Mar and Sep had the biggest gap of 1187.0 between the highest and lowest Average retail price in CAD found for 2016.
min_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 on the X-axis.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in CAD for both 2016 and 2015 have grew.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in CAD for both 2016 and 2015 have grew.
For Month Oct, 2015 had the highest Average retail price in CAD 1323.0 among the 5 groups and in Dec, 2019 had the lowest Average retail price in CAD 0.0.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in CAD for both 2016 and 2015 have grew.
Month Oct had the maximum Average retail price in CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Average retail price in CAD was observed in Month Dec for 2019.
Among all the Months, 2016 had the highest Average retail price in CAD 1311.0 in Month Mar and lowest value 124.0 in Month Sep.
The maximum Average retail price in CAD for 2016 that was found in Month Mar was 10.57 times larger than the minimum Average retail price in CAD observed in Month Sep.
Among all 5 groups, 2015 had the gap of 1195.0 between the maximum and minimum Average retail price in CAD observed in Month Oct and Dec respectively.

In case of Month Oct, 2015 had the highest Average retail price in CAD 1323.0 among the 5 groups and in Dec, 2019 had the lowest Average retail price in CAD 0.0. The second highest Average retail price in CAD 1245.0 was observed for 2015 in Month Oct.
Averaging all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Month Apr is the maximum Average retail price in CAD and Dec is the minimum Average retail price in CAD.
